nodes.text: Kamino Station X was a facility on the planet Kamino. After the Assault on Kamino in the year before the Battle of Yavin, the Rebel Alliance found the notes of the Galactic Empire's Lead Cloning Technician in a garbage processing facility at the station.
Kamino Station X was mentioned in the Dark Apprentice Databank entry in the PS3 and Xbox 360 versions of the 2010 video game Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II.
